original_text: Now, a different king ruled Egypt. This new king did not know anything about Joseph and what he had done.
korean_text: 요셉을 알지 못하는 새 임금이 애굽 왕위에 오르매

sentences.original_text: Now, a different king ruled Egypt.
This new king did not know anything about Joseph
sentences.korean_translation: 이 새로운 왕은 요셉에 대해 아무것도 알지 못했고
